name: BAZIC Products Washable Clear School Glue 5 Oz. (147 mL), Liquid Clear Glues Adhesive, for Making Slime Art Crafts at School Home Office, 1-Pack
short_description: ⭐ ALL PURPOSE. Clear liquid glue is washable, acid-free, photo-safe and non-toxic. Clean easily off from hands and some clothes.
⭐ EASY TO USE. Simply squeeze the bottle, apply proper amount of glue on the paper, and bond it with another subject. Dries clear and applies smoothly.
⭐ DRIES QUICKLY & BINDING. Smooth formula great for making homemade slime. You can also add color and glitter to customize unique slimes
⭐ SAFE & ACID FREE. Created for home and office use. Washable, acid-free, and non-toxic adhesive. Perfect for scrapbook, arts, crafts projects. Permanently bonding photos, papers, mailing, envelopes.

⭐ BAZIC Washable Products can wash away from the skin and most washable clothing types. However, it is best to keep it away from non-glossy table surfaces, finished & unfinished wood products, upholstered seats, vinyl, carpeting, wallpaper, painted walls and other materials that can not be laundered.
